ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( AND( ISCHANGED( Status ), ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Churned')), ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Churned') ), OR( ISBLANK( UsageEndDate ), ISBLANK( TEXT(Churned_Reason__c)), UsageEndDate>TODAY() ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Usage End Date (date cannot be future date) and Churned Reason are required when Asset Status is Churned
